statements: SELECT * FROM user_progress;
SELECT user_id, progress_percentage FROM user_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT achievement_id, last_activity_date FROM user_progress ORDER BY last_activity_date DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, progress_percentage FROM user_progress WHERE achievement_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM user_progress WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50 ORDER BY last_activity_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(achievement_id) AS total_achievements FROM user_progress GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_achievements > 3;
SELECT AVG(progress_percentage) AS average_progress FROM user_progress;
SELECT user_id, last_activity_date FROM user_progress WHERE achievement_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY user_id ASC, last_activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_progress WHERE progress_percentage BETWEEN 25 AND 75 ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_progress;
SELECT user_id, progress FROM user_progress ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_progress WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM user_achievements ORDER BY achievement_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(achievement_name) AS total_achievements FROM user_achievements GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_achievements > 3;
SELECT * FROM user_progress WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT user_id, achievement_name FROM user_achievements WHERE achievement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(achievement_name) AS total_achievements FROM user_achievements GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_progress JOIN user_achievements ON user_progress.user_id = user_achievements.user_id;
SELECT user_id, MAX(progress) AS highest_progress FROM user_progress WHERE progress IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_date FROM achievements WHERE achievement_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, module_completed FROM progress WHERE module_completed = True ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users, progress, achievements;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM progress WHERE completion_date > '2021-01-01' AND module_completed = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM achievements ORDER BY achievement_date ASC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_date FROM user_achievements WHERE user_id = '323e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' ORDER BY achievement_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_joined_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, course_description, course_id FROM courses ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_progress;
SELECT user_id, progress_percentage FROM user_progress WHERE course_id = '123';
SELECT users.user_name, courses.course_name FROM users JOIN user_progress ON users.user_id = user_progress.user_id JOIN courses ON user_progress.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT user_name, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM users JOIN user_achievements ON users.user_id = user_achievements.user_id;
SELECT user_id, course_id, MAX(progress_percentage) AS max_progress FROM user_progress GROUP BY user_id, course_id;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE course_difficulty = 'Intermediate' ORDER BY course_duration DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_duration < 10;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_date FROM achievements ORDER BY achievement_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, quiz_id, score FROM quiz_results WHERE completion_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '1b9d6bcd-bbfd-4b2d-9b5d-ab8dfbbd4bed';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id = '1b9d6bcd-bbfd-4b2d-9b5d-ab8dfbbd4bed';
SELECT course_name, course_duration, course_difficulty FROM courses WHERE course_duration > 30;
SELECT user_name, course_name, completion_status FROM users JOIN progress ON users.user_id = progress.user_id;
SELECT user_name, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM users JOIN achievements ON users.user_id = achievements.user_id WHERE achievement_date > '2021-01-01';
